28 namespace eprosima{
29 namespace fastrtps{
30 namespace rtps{
31 
50 class UDPv6Transport : public TransportInterface
51 {
52  class SocketInfo
53  {
54  public:
55 
56 #if defined(ASIO_HAS_MOVE)
57  SocketInfo(asio::ip::udp::socket& socket) :
58  socket_(std::move(socket)), only_multicast_purpose_(false)
59 #else
60  SocketInfo(std::shared_ptr<asio::ip::udp::socket> socket) :
61  socket_(socket), only_multicast_purpose_(false)
62 #endif
63  {
64  }
65 
66  SocketInfo(SocketInfo&& socketInfo) :
67 #if defined(ASIO_HAS_MOVE)
68  socket_(std::move(socketInfo.socket_)),
69 #else
70  socket_(socketInfo.socket_),
71 #endif
72  only_multicast_purpose_(socketInfo.only_multicast_purpose_)
73  {
74  }
75 
76  SocketInfo& operator=(SocketInfo&& socketInfo)
77  {
78 #if defined(ASIO_HAS_MOVE)
79  socket_ = std::move(socketInfo.socket_);
80 #else
81  socket_ = socketInfo.socket_;
82 #endif
83  only_multicast_purpose_ = socketInfo.only_multicast_purpose_;
84  return *this;
85  }
86 
87  void only_multicast_purpose(const bool value)
88  {
89  only_multicast_purpose_ = value;
90  };
91 
92  bool& only_multicast_purpose()
93  {
94  return only_multicast_purpose_;
95  }
96 
97  bool only_multicast_purpose() const
98  {
99  return only_multicast_purpose_;
100  }
101 
102 #if defined(ASIO_HAS_MOVE)
103  asio::ip::udp::socket socket_;
104 #else
105  std::shared_ptr<asio::ip::udp::socket> socket_;
106 #endif
107  bool only_multicast_purpose_;
108 
109  private:
110 
111  SocketInfo(const SocketInfo&) = delete;
112  SocketInfo& operator=(const SocketInfo&) = delete;
113  };
114 
115 public:
116 
117  RTPS_DllAPI UDPv6Transport(const UDPv6TransportDescriptor&);
118 
119  ~UDPv6Transport();
120 
121  bool init();
122 
124  virtual bool IsInputChannelOpen(const Locator_t&) const;
125 
129  virtual bool IsOutputChannelOpen(const Locator_t&) const;
130 
132  virtual bool IsLocatorSupported(const Locator_t&) const;
133 
135  virtual bool DoLocatorsMatch(const Locator_t&, const Locator_t&) const;
136 
142  virtual Locator_t RemoteToMainLocal(const Locator_t&) const;
143 
148  virtual bool OpenInputChannel(const Locator_t&);
149 
153  virtual bool OpenOutputChannel(Locator_t&);
154 
156  virtual bool CloseInputChannel(const Locator_t&);
157 
159  virtual bool CloseOutputChannel(const Locator_t&);
160 
170  virtual bool Send(const octet* sendBuffer, uint32_t sendBufferSize, const Locator_t& localLocator, const Locator_t& remoteLocator);
178  virtual bool Receive(octet* receiveBuffer, uint32_t receiveBufferCapacity, uint32_t& receiveBufferSize,
179  const Locator_t& localLocator, Locator_t& remoteLocator);
180 
181  virtual LocatorList_t NormalizeLocator(const Locator_t& locator);
182 
183 private:
184  uint32_t mMaxMessageSize;
185  uint32_t mSendBufferSize;
186  uint32_t mReceiveBufferSize;
187  uint8_t mTTL;
188 
189  // For UDPv6, the notion of channel corresponds to a port + direction tuple.
190  asio::io_service mService;
191  std::unique_ptr<std::thread> ioServiceThread;
192 
193  mutable std::recursive_mutex mOutputMapMutex;
194  mutable std::recursive_mutex mInputMapMutex;
195 
197  std::map<uint32_t, std::vector<SocketInfo> > mOutputSockets;
199  struct LocatorCompare{ bool operator()(const Locator_t& lhs, const Locator_t& rhs) const
200  {return (memcmp(&lhs, &rhs, sizeof(Locator_t)) < 0); } };
202 #if defined(ASIO_HAS_MOVE)
203  std::map<uint32_t, asio::ip::udp::socket> mInputSockets;
204 #else
205  std::map<uint32_t, std::shared_ptr<asio::ip::udp::socket>> mInputSockets;
206 #endif
207 
208  bool IsInterfaceAllowed(const asio::ip::address_v6& ip);
209  std::vector<asio::ip::address_v6> mInterfaceWhiteList;
210 
211 
212  bool OpenAndBindOutputSockets(Locator_t& locator);
213  bool OpenAndBindInputSockets(uint32_t port, bool is_multicast);
214 
215 #if defined(ASIO_HAS_MOVE)
216  asio::ip::udp::socket OpenAndBindUnicastOutputSocket(const asio::ip::address_v6&, uint32_t& port);
217  asio::ip::udp::socket OpenAndBindInputSocket(uint32_t port, bool is_multicast);
218 
219  bool SendThroughSocket(const octet* sendBuffer,
220  uint32_t sendBufferSize,
221  const Locator_t& remoteLocator,
222  asio::ip::udp::socket& socket);
223 #else
224  std::shared_ptr<asio::ip::udp::socket> OpenAndBindUnicastOutputSocket(const asio::ip::address_v6&, uint32_t& port);
225  std::shared_ptr<asio::ip::udp::socket> OpenAndBindInputSocket(uint32_t port, bool is_multicast);
226 
227  bool SendThroughSocket(const octet* sendBuffer,
228  uint32_t sendBufferSize,
229  const Locator_t& remoteLocator,
230  std::shared_ptr<asio::ip::udp::socket> socket);
231 #endif
232 };
233
